content: > this cardigan is an easy top down project the cardigan begins at the neck and is worked back and forth in half_double_crochet until reaching the underarms on every row the yoke of the cardigan is increased along raglan lines after the yoke is completed the cardigan continues in a solid shell pattern this double breasted cropped cardigan is meant to be close-fitting with a slightly boxy shape but it is easy to adjust both the sleeve and body length note the pattern was updated in 09 09 there was an error in the size medium sleeves
